column4: When I use either the livecd or install cd the keyboard doesn't respond... what should I do?
that happened to me (usb wireless keyboard) and i just plugged in an old ps2 keyboard to hit ENTER and then unplugged it and the wireless one worked the rest of the install
I'm not sure if the install cd freezes, should the cursor blink?
I'll try that. I have had similar problems with USB keyboards and linux
